00020 #include "ObjectModelPlaneFromLines.h"

00022 namespace brics_3d {
00023 
00024 void ObjectModelPlaneFromLines::computeRandomModel (int &iterations, Eigen::VectorXf &model_coefficients, bool &isDegenerate, bool &modelFound){
00025 
00026         std::vector<int> samples;
00027         std::vector<int> selection;
00028         getSamples(iterations,selection);
00029 
00030         if (selection.size () == 0){
00031                 isDegenerate = false;
00032                 modelFound = false;
00033                 return;
00034         } else {
00035 
00036                 isDegenerate = true;
00037 
00038         }
00039 
00040         if (!computeModelCoefficients (selection, model_coefficients)){
00041                 modelFound = false;
00042                 return;
00043         } else {
00044                 modelFound = true;
00045                 return;
00046         }
00047 
00048 }

00050 
00051 void ObjectModelPlaneFromLines::getSamples (int &iterations, std::vector<int> &samples){
00052 
00053         assert(this->inputPointCloud!=NULL);
00054 
00055         //points = inputPointCloud->getPointCloud();
00056 
00057         samples.resize (4);
00058         double trand = inputPointCloud->getSize() / (RAND_MAX + 1.0);
00059 
00060 
00061         int idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00062         // Get the index
00063         samples[0] = idx;
00064 
00065         // Get a second point which is different than the first
00066         do
00067         {
00068                 idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00069                 samples[1] = idx;
00070                 iterations++;
00071         } while (samples[1] == samples[0]);
00072         iterations--;
00073         // Get the values at the two points
00074         Eigen::Vector4f p0, p1, p2;
00075         // SSE friendly data check
00076         p1 = Eigen::Vector4f ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getZ(), 0);
00077         p0 = Eigen::Vector4f ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getZ(), 0);
00078 
00079         // Compute the segment values (in 3d) between p1 and p0
00080         p1 -= p0;
00081 
00082         Eigen::Vector4f dy1dy2;
00083         int iter = 0;
00084         do
00085         {
00086                 // Get the third point, different from the first two
00087                 do
00088                 {
00089                         idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00090                         samples[2] = idx;
00091                         iterations++;
00092                 } while ( (samples[2] == samples[1]) || (samples[2] == samples[0]) );
00093                 iterations--;
00094 
00095                 // SSE friendly data check
00096                 p2 = Eigen::Vector4f ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getZ(), 0);
00097 
00098                 // Compute the segment values (in 3d) between p2 and p0
00099                 p2 -= p0;
00100 
00101 #ifdef EIGEN3
00102                 dy1dy2 = p1.array () / p2.array();
00103 #else
00104                 dy1dy2 = p1.cwise () / p2;
00105 #endif
00106                 ++iter;
00107                 if (iter > MAX_ITERATIONS_COLLINEAR )
00108                 {
00109                         cout<<"[SampleConsensusModelPlane::getSamples] WARNING: Could not select 3 non collinear points in"<<  MAX_ITERATIONS_COLLINEAR <<"iterations!";
00110                         break;
00111                 }
00112                 iterations++;
00113         }
00114         while ( (dy1dy2[0] == dy1dy2[1]) && (dy1dy2[2] == dy1dy2[1]) );
00115         iterations--;
00116 
00117         //Select a fourth point which is not equal to the other three non-collinear points
00118         if(iter < MAX_ITERATIONS_COLLINEAR) {
00119                 do
00120                 {
00121                         idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00122                         samples[3] = idx;
00123                         iterations++;
00124 
00125                         if (iter > MAX_ITERATIONS_COLLINEAR )
00126                         {
00127                                 cout<<"[SampleConsensusModelPlane::getSamples] WARNING: Could not select 4 points in"<<  MAX_ITERATIONS_COLLINEAR <<"iterations!";
00128                                 break;
00129                         }
00130 
00131                 } while ( (samples[3] == samples[0]) || (samples[3] == samples[1]) || (samples[3] == samples[2]) );
00132                 iterations--;
00133         }
00134 
00135 }
00136 
00137 bool
00138 ObjectModelPlaneFromLines::computeModelCoefficients (const std::vector<int> &sample,
00139                 Eigen::VectorXf &modelCoefficients){
00140 
00141         line line1,line2;
00142 
00143         //Create line1 from sample[0] and sample[1]
00144         line1.pbase = (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[0]];
00145         line1.director.resize(3);
00146         line1.director[0]=(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[1]].getX() - (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[0]].getX();
00147         line1.director[1]=(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[1]].getY() - (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[0]].getY();
00148         line1.director[2]=(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[1]].getZ() - (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[0]].getZ();
00149 
00150         //Create line1 from sample[2] and sample[3]
00151         line2.pbase = (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[2]];
00152         line2.director.resize(3);
00153         line2.director[0]=(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[3]].getX() - (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[2]].getX();
00154         line2.director[1]=(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[3]].getY() - (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[2]].getY();
00155         line2.director[2]=(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[3]].getZ() - (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[2]].getZ();
00156 
00157 
00158 
00159         //Compute the model co-efficient of the lines from these lines
00160         std::vector<double> normal;
00161         normal.resize(3);
00162 
00163         crossProduct3D(line1.director,line2.director,normal);
00164 
00165         modelCoefficients.resize(4);
00166 
00167         modelCoefficients[0] = normal[0];
00168         modelCoefficients[1] = normal[1];
00169         modelCoefficients[2] = normal[2];
00170 
00171         modelCoefficients[3]= -modelCoefficients[0] * line1.pbase.getX() -
00172                         modelCoefficients[1] * line1.pbase.getY() -
00173                         modelCoefficients[2] * line1.pbase.getZ();
00174 
00175 
00176         if (abs(modelCoefficients[0])<geometryEpsilon&&abs(modelCoefficients[1])<geometryEpsilon&&abs(modelCoefficients[2])<geometryEpsilon)    {
00177                 //Lines are parallel
00178                 if (contains(line1, line2.pbase))
00179                         return false;
00180 
00181                 //Use a line's director vector and both pBase's difference to create the plane.
00182                 std::vector<double> baseDifference;
00183                 baseDifference.resize(3);
00184                 baseDifference[0]=line1.pbase.getX()-line2.pbase.getX();
00185                 baseDifference[1]=line1.pbase.getY()-line2.pbase.getY();
00186                 baseDifference[2]=line1.pbase.getZ()-line2.pbase.getZ();
00187 
00188                 crossProduct3D(line1.director,baseDifference,normal);
00189                 modelCoefficients[0] = normal[0];
00190                 modelCoefficients[1] = normal[1];
00191                 modelCoefficients[2] = normal[2];
00192 
00193                 modelCoefficients[3]=-modelCoefficients[0] * line1.pbase.getX() -modelCoefficients[1] * line1.pbase.getY() -modelCoefficients[2] * line1.pbase.getZ();
00194 
00195         }       else {
00196 
00197                 double  x = modelCoefficients[0]*line2.pbase.getX()+
00198                                 modelCoefficients[1]*line2.pbase.getY()+
00199                                 modelCoefficients[2]*line2.pbase.getZ()+modelCoefficients[3];
00200                 if (abs(x)>=geometryEpsilon) {
00201                         cout<<"Lines do not intersect"<<endl;
00202                         return false;
00203                 }
00204         }
00205 
00206         return true;
00207 }
